Internships @
 
 

Internships

Now recruiting for Summer 2018

Who Can Apply

At Paravane, we value drive and initiative over past experience. For that reason, we welcome everyone from freshmen to seniors to apply for our internships. Students of all majors are encouraged to apply.

Most of our summer internships are remote. However, at this time, we can only consider students based in the United States because we are unavailable to sponsor or offer work authorization.

Compensation

Our internships are paid, but the payment structure varies by role. Payment is some form of commission or profit-sharing for business roles.

Most of our summer internships are remote.

Experience

If you are looking to maximize earnings this summer, Paravane is most likely not the place for you. Because our portfolio is comprised of early stage startups, we are unable to offer the most competitive compensation packages.

However, if your goal is to maximize your learning by working with industry leaders with previous experience at top companies, Paravane is the place for you.

Apply

Open Roles


Communications Strategy & PR Intern

You will create a communication and press release strategy for a portfolio company for external messaging to news organization and partners.

Social Media & Content Marketing Intern

You will craft messaging on social media and content creation for a portfolio company.


Apply


Apply


Email your resume to team@paladin.ventures with the subject line including the role(s) you are interested in. You may apply to up to two different roles. Please specify which role you prefer in the body of the email. Expect to hear back within 5-7 business days if we will be moving forward with your candidacy.
